Function Documentation

int bgpstream_as_path_populate ( bgpstream_as_path_t *  path,
struct aspath *  bd_path 
)

Populate an AS Path structure based on a BGP Dump AS Path Attribute.

Parameters
pathpointer to the AS Path to populate
bd_pathpointer to a BGP Dump AS Path attribute structure
Returns
0 if the path was populated successfully, -1 otherwise
